title: about
content: Just a casual mathematics blog When I let go of what I am I become what I might be Nature does not hurry yet everything is accomplished Laozi

title: distrait passenger
content: 100 passengers enter the cabin in order the first 10 passengers are distrait and randomly choose their seat Other passengers comes in order they will seat at their seat if it was not taken or randomly choose an available seat otherwise What is the probability that the very last passenger seat in his own seat
